mapper.sql: proj_id, proj_name, proj_desc,startTime,endTime, manager, auditee, auditedManager, supervisor, office, officeManager, creater,createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ed_proj_info
where proj_name like concat(concat("%", #{projName}), "%") escape '/'
mapper.insert: insert into ed_proj_info ( proj_id, proj_name, proj_desc, startTime,endTime, manager, auditee, auditedManager, supervisor, office, officeManager, creater,createTime ) values ( #{projId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{auditedManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{office,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officeManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
update ed_proj_info
proj_name = #{projName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proj_desc = #{projDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auditee = #{auditee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auditedManager = #{auditedManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supervisor = #{supervisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
office = #{office,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
officeManager = #{officeManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where proj_id = #{projId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from ed_proj_info where proj_id = #{projId,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1
